description: Connect to Firebird databases to query data, explore schemas, and understand table relationships. Generate, execute, and explain SQL while analyzing performance, execution plans, and missing indexes. Backup, restore, and validate databases, run health checks, and manage batch operations.

host.description: Hostname or IP address of the Firebird database server

port.description: Port number for the Firebird database

database.description: Absolute path to the Firebird database file (e.g., /path/to/database.fdb)

useNativeDriver.description: Enable native driver for wire encryption support

capabilities.name: execute-query
capabilities.description: Executes a SQL query in the Firebird database. Uses FIRST/ROWS for pagination.

capabilities.name: list-tables
capabilities.description: Lists all user tables in the current Firebird database.

capabilities.name: describe-table
capabilities.description: Gets the detailed schema (columns, types, etc.) of a specific table.

capabilities.name: get-field-descriptions
capabilities.description: Gets the stored descriptions for fields of a specific table (if they exist).

capabilities.name: analyze-query-performance
capabilities.description: Analyzes the performance of a SQL query by executing it multiple times and measuring execution time

capabilities.name: get-execution-plan
capabilities.description: Gets the execution plan for a SQL query to understand how the database will execute it

capabilities.name: analyze-missing-indexes
capabilities.description: Analyzes a SQL query to identify missing indexes that could improve performance

capabilities.name: backup-database
capabilities.description: Creates a backup of the Firebird database

capabilities.name: restore-database
capabilities.description: Restores a Firebird database from a backup

capabilities.name: validate-database
capabilities.description: Validates the integrity of the Firebird database

capabilities.name: execute-batch-queries
capabilities.description: Executes multiple SQL queries in parallel for improved performance.

capabilities.name: describe-batch-tables
capabilities.description: Gets the detailed schema of multiple tables in parallel for improved performance.

capabilities.name: get-table-data
capabilities.description: Retrieves data from a specific table with optional filtering, pagination, and ordering.

capabilities.name: analyze-table-statistics
capabilities.description: Analyzes statistical information about a table including row count, column statistics, and data distribution.

capabilities.name: verify-wire-encryption
capabilities.description: Verifies if the current database connection is using wire encryption (requires native driver).

capabilities.name: get-database-info
capabilities.description: Retrieves general information about the connected Firebird database.

capabilities.name: get-server-info
capabilities.description: Obtiene información sobre el servidor MCP Firebird y las herramientas disponibles

capabilities.name: list-available-tools
capabilities.description: Lista todas las herramientas disponibles en el servidor MCP

capabilities.name: get-tool-help
capabilities.description: Obtiene información detallada sobre una herramienta específica

capabilities.name: system-health-check
capabilities.description: Verifica el estado de salud del sistema y la conectividad de la base de datos

capabilities.name: echo
capabilities.description: Echoes back the input message
